title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6700.5 - Copies and fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6700.5 - Copies and fees

State Regulations

Persons who seek to inspect the records of the commission may
request that copies of those records be made. The records access officer shall
try to provide such copies at the time requested, if possible. The fee for such
copies is 25 cents per page for records up to 8 1/2 by 14 inches in size, and
one dollar per page for documents in excess of that size. Payment may be made
by cash to the extent of five dollars, or check or money order made payable to
"Commissioner of Taxation and Finance". Notes

6700.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
